overview: Darby Clyde Fenster and Jerry Martin are a pair of penniless nincompoop-drifters who hop a freight train on their way to Florida. Our intrepid heroes find themselves facing one comic situation after another in this gloriously loopy Southern fried comedy-with-music.
tagline: Moonshiners - Madness and Cottonpickin' COUNTRY MUSIC
title: Cottonpickin' Chickenpickers
